desc: Metavo is an avocado-based dietary supplement that rebalances your metabolism. Metavo is the only dietary supplement on the market with AvoB, a powerful bioactive found only in avocados that targets the underlying cause of dysfunctional metabolism. Metavo also works to maintain normal blood sugar levels.

layout.text: Take Control of Your Health, Naturally.
Help Balance Blood Sugars and Curb Sugar Cravings
